title: I Became the War God’s Successor - Novel Updates
tags: Cunning Protagonist   Dungeons   Fantasy World   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hunters   Level System   Magical Technology   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Special Abilities   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World
author: 그루밤
description:
One day, suddenly, I became the main character in a game. But the more I look at this protagonist, the more I sighed. The lowest stats, worst talent, no connections…

However…

– You have acquired [Heavenly Infinite Body]

– You became the owner of [Book of Gods]>
